RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT FORMAT_NAME,FORMAT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_USERREF_FORMAT_MASTER WHERE AUTH_STAT='A' AND RECORD_STAT='O'
SELECT CUSTOMER_NO,CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM STTMS_CORE_CUSTOMER WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A'
SELECT DISTINCT(PRODUCT),PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM TLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER A,OLTMS_PRODUCT B WHERE A.PRODUCT=B.PRODUCT_CODE AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE='P' AND B.AUTH_STAT='A' AND B.RECORD_STAT='O'
SELECT BRANCH_CODE,BRANCH_NAME FROM STTMS_CORE_BRANCH WHERE AUTH_STAT='A' AND RECORD_STAT='O'
SELECT DESK_CODE,DESK_DESC,DESK_TYPE FROM LBTMS_DESK WHERE AUTH_STAT='A' AND RECORD_STAT='O'
SELECT x.PORTFOLIO FROM TLTM_PORTFOLIO x WHERE NVL(x.UNFRONTED,'N') = 'Y' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O'
